AbilityDef.label: minor summon
AbilityDef.description: Summon a creature that will stay around for a short period. It will be hostile to any targets hostile to the caster.

AbilityDef.label: summon
AbilityDef.description: Summon a creature that will stay around for a short period. It will be hostile to any targets hostile to the caster.

AbilityDef.label: major summon
AbilityDef.description: Summon a creature that will stay around for a short period. It will be hostile to any targets hostile to the caster.
